name: User views the issued identity in the EUDI Wallet
scenarioId: android/A_combined_business_scenario_on_Travel_4/Travel-Issue_Identity_attestations_65/photoIDSameDevice:User views the issued identity in the EUDI Wallet
methodName: User views the issued identity in the EUDI Wallet

testSteps.description: Given the user sees a success message in EUDI Wallet app
When the user presses on the CONTINUE button
Then the photo ID is presented in the EUDI Wallet dashboard screen

userStory.narrative:
As a user of the EUDI Wallet
  I want to request and store photo ID attestations in my EUDI Wallet
  So that I can identify myself using my EUDI Wallet in my travel user journey by presenting the requested attestations

title: User views the issued identity in the EUDI Wallet
